Verses: 1 savul Mariththapinbu, Dhaaveedhu Amalekkiyarai Muriya Adiththu, Siklaagukkuth Thirumbivandhu, Irandunaal Ange Irundhapirpaadu,

2 moondraamnaalile Oru Manushan Savulin Paalayaththilirundhu Purappattu, Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu, Than Thalaiyinmel Puzhudhiyaip Pottuk Kondu, Dhaaveedhinidaththil Vandhu, Tharaiyile Vizhundhu Vananginaan.
3 dhaaveedhu Avanaip Paarththu: Nee Engeyirundhu Vandhaai Endru Kettadharku Avan: Isravelin Paalayaththilirundhu Thappivandhen Endraan.

4 dhaaveedhu Avanaip Paarththu: Nadandha Seydhi Enna? Sol Endru Kettadharku, Avan: Janangal Yuththaththaivittu Murindhodipponaargal; Janangalil Anegamper Vizhundhu Madindhuponaargal; Savulum Avar Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanum Madindhaargal Endraan.
5 savulum Avar Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanum Madindhuponadhu Unakku Eppadith Theriyum Endru Dhaaveedhu Thanakku Adhai Arivikkira Vaalibanidaththil Kettadharku,
6 andha Vaaliban Naan Tharcheyalaaik Kilbovaa Malaikkup Ponen; Appozhudhu Idho, Savul Thammudaiya Eettiyinmel Saaindhu Kondirundhaar; Radhangalum Kudhiraiveerarum Avaraith Thodarndhu Nerunginaargal.
7 avar Thirumbip Paarththu, Ennaik Kandu Kooppittaar. Adharku Naan: Idho, Irukkiren Endren,
8 appozhudhu Avar: Nee Yaar Endru Ennaik Kettaar; Naan Amalekkiyan Endru Sonnen.
9 avar Ennai Nokki: Nee Ennandaiyil Kittavandhu Nindru Ennaik Kondrupodu; En Praanan Muzhudhum Innum Pogaadhadhinaal Enakku Vedhanaiyaayirukkiradhu Endraar.

10 appozhudhu Naan, Avar Vizhundha Pinbu Pizhaikkamaattaar Endru Nichchayiththu, Avarandaiyil Poi Nindru Avaraik Kondrupotten; Pirpaadu Avar Thalaiyinmel Irundha Mudiyaiyum Avar Buyaththil Irundha Asthakadagaththaiyum Eduththukkondu Avaigalai Inge En Aandavanidaththirkuk Konduvandhen Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Dhaaveedhum Avanodirundha Sagala Manusharum Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu,
12 savulum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanum Karththarudaiya Janangalum, Isravel Kudumbaththaarum, Pattayaththaale Vizhundhapadiyinaal Pulambi Azhudhu Saayangaalamattum Ubavaasamaayirundhaargal.
13 dhaaveedhu Adhaith Thanakku Ariviththa Vaalibanaip Paarththu: Nee Evvidaththaan Endru Kettadharku, Avan: Naan Anniya Jaadhiyaanudaiya Magan, Naan Amalekkiyan Endraan.
14 dhaaveedhu Avanai Nokki: Karththar Abishegampanninavaraik Kondru Podumpadi Nee Un Kaiyai Neetta Bayappadaamarponadhu Enna Endru Solli,
15 vaalibaril Oruvanaik Kooppittu: Nee Kittappoi Avanmel Vizhundhu Avanai Vettu Endraan; Avan Avanai Vettinaan; Avan Seththaan.
16 dhaaveedhu Avanaip Paarththu: Un Raththappazhi Un Thalaiyinmel Iruppadhaaga; Karththar Abishegampanninavarai Naan Kondrupotten Endru Un Vaaye Unakku Virodhamaana Saatchi Sollitru Endraan.
17 dhaaveedhu Savulinperilum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaaninperilum Pulambal Paadinaan.
18 (vilviththaiyai Yoodhaa Puththirarukkuk Katrukkodukkumpadi Kattalaiyittaan; Adhu Yaaserin Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.) Avan Paadina Pulambalaavadhu:
19 isravelin Alangaaram Uyarndha Sthaanangalil Adhamaayitru; Paraakkiramasaaligal Vizhundhuponaargal.

20 pelistharin Kumaaraththigal Sandhoshappadaadhapadikkum, Viruththasedhanam Illaadhavargalin Kumaaraththigal Kalikooraadhapadikkum, Adhaik Kaadhpattanaththil Ariviyaamalum Askalonin Veedhigalil Prasthaabappaduththaamalum Irungal.

21 kilbovaa Malaigale, Ungalmel Paniyum Mazhaiyum Peyyaamalum Kaanikkaikku Etra Palantharum Vayalgal Raamalum Povadhaaga; Ange Paraakkiramasaaligaludaiya Kedagam Avamadhikkappattadhu; Savul Thailaththaal Abishegampannappadaadhavarpola Avar Kedagamum Avamadhikkappattadhe.
22 kolaiyundavargalin Raththaththaik Kudiyaamalum, Paraakkiramasaaligalin Ninaththai Unnaamalum, Yonaththaanudaiya Vil Pinvaanginadhillai; Savulin Pattayam Verumaiyaaith Thirumbinadhillai.

23 uyirode Irukkaiyil Savulum Yonaththaanum Piriyamum Inbamumaayirundhaargal; Maranaththilum Pirindhu Ponadhillai; Kazhugugalaippaarkkilum Vegamum Singangalaippaarkkilum Balamumullavargalaayirundhaargal.
24 isravelin Kumaaraththigale, Ungalukku Raththaambaraththai Sirappaai Uduppiththu, Ungal Udaiyinmel Pon Aabaranangalaith Tharippiththa Savulukkaaga Azhudhu Pulambungal.
25 pormugaththil Paraakkiramasaaligal Vizhundhaargale, Yonaththaane, Uyaramaana Sthalangalile Vettundu Ponaaye.

26 en Sagodhaaranaagiya Yonaththaane, Unakkaaga Naan Vyaagulappadugiren; Nee Enakku Vegu Inbamaayirundhaai; Un Snegam Aachchariyamaayirundhadhu; Sthreegalin Snegaththaippaarkkilum Adhigamaayirundhadhu.
27 paraakkiramasaaligal Vizhundhu Ponaargale; Yuththa Aayudhangal Ellaam Azhindhupoyitre, Endru Paadinaan.
